Multiple claims were made regarding Paki: s request for made-in-India COVID vaccine under the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunisation (GAVI).
Times Now initially tweeted about India: 3. Punjab Kesari claimed that India has given free vaccines to Pakistan, but the article attached to the tweet is no longer available.
The vaccines allocated to Pakistan are f: co-led by CEPI, Gavi, WHO, and UNICEF, with existing agreements with the Serum Institute of India for 200 million doses of vaccines.
